alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 444 PM EDT/344 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Red Oak, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Kennys Mill, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Woods, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Torreya State Park and Hugh Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
